name: Minimalistic Magister v1.52 (Custom Color)
description:
Works on every Magister website!
Minimalistic Magister. Primary color (blue) can be changed!
Magister Minimaal. Primaire kleur (blauw) kan veranderd worden!
Primary Color can be set under 'Advanced Style Settings. (Customize Settings)'
additional_info:
Update v2.0
[CHANGED]
Magisters layout changed. So I decided to change the style too! ^^
[NEW]
Changed some more blue things to your preferred color.

Update v1.5
[NEW]
Now you can change the text that's at the right top section of the login page. It usually says 'Magister', now you are able to change it :P

Update v1.38
[NEW]
Now you can set the  'username' label to your chosen color. 

Update v1.37
[NEW]
- Fix: accounts.magister.net was glitched, this is fixed now.

Created v1.0
[NEW]
-everything.

style_settings.label: Text, right top on login page. Usually 'Magister'.
